name: Project Havoc
description:
Description:
A waved-based combat game that gives you access to 3 key power sets and pits you against hordes of soldiers. Created as part of the Florida Interactive Entertainment Academy (FIEA) graduate program.

Credits:

  • Ross Winters - AI and Core Gameplay
  • Neri St.Charles - UI and Wave System
  • Jason Nguyen - Level Design and Genetic Algorithm
